text: "I Believe (A Soulful Re-Recording)" is a 1985 song by British new wave band Tears for Fears and is the fifth single from their second studio album Songs from the Big Chair. It went to the top 40 in Ireland, the United Kingdom and New Zealand. ==Track listings== ===7": Mercury / IDEA11 (UK)=== # "I Believe (A Soulful Re-Recording)" (4:35) # "Sea Song" (3:52) ===2x7": Mercury / IDEA1111 (UK)=== # "I Believe (A Soulful Re-Recording)" (4:35) # "Sea Song" (3:52) # "I Believe (Album Version)" (4:37) # "Shout (Dub Version)" (6:45) ===10": Mercury / IDEA1110 (UK)=== # "I Believe (A Soulful Re-Recording)" (4:35) # "I Believe (Album Version)" (4:37) # "Sea Song" (3:52) ===12": Mercury / IDEA1112 (UK)=== # "I Believe (A Soulful Re-Recording)" (4:35) # "Shout (Dub Version)" (6:45) # "Sea Song" (3:52) # "Shout (U.S. Remix)" (8:00) == References == Category:1985 songs Category:Tears for Fears songs
title: I Believe (Tears for Fears song)
